text: Arcachon (Arcaishon in Gascon) is a commune in the Gironde department in southwestern France, Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. It is a popular beach on the Atlantic coast southwest of Bordeaux in the Landes forest. ==Geography== The commune of Arcachon has an area of , and its average altitude is ; at the city hall, the altitude is . Arcachon and its neighboring communes The commune has to the south the La Teste de Buch commune and to the north the Arcachon Bay (), a bay of the Atlantic Ocean on the southwest coast of France. ===Climate=== The climate of Arcachon is Marine West Coast Climate (Köppen climate classification: Cfb), with mild winters and warm summers. ==Population== The inhabitants of Arcachon are known, in French, as Arcachonnais (women: Arcachonnaises). With a population of 10,370, Arcachon has a population density of inhabitants/km2.
